parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>2.02

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Menu

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets shortcut of given menu strip entry.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[menuSetShortcut]] [idc, path, shortcut]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> path: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> shortcut: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> control [[menuSetShortcut]] [path, shortcut]

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> control: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> path: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> shortcut: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value>  <Code>_ctrlMenuStrip [[menuSetShortcut]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>[</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>0,0],2048 + 0x16]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>ALT + U</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[menuShortcut]] [[menuShortcutText]]
</value></part></template>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
